subSubSection.paragraph: Voucher material, NHM_329, disc approx 20mm in diameter. Additional voucher material (12 specimens) ranges in size from 2mm to 20mm in diameter (Fig. 20). Range of polymorphs observed characterised by pattern of disc dorsal coloration (Fig. 20). Juveniles observed and identified from DNA data.
Genetic data for this taxa with new GenBank accession numbers are provided in Table 2
The most abundant brittle-star in the UK-1 exploration claim survey box UK-1 Stratum A, frequently observed by the ROV on the sediment surface and on nodules.
